episodes.title: The Bronfman Empire: From Bootlegging Kings to a Sex Cult Scandal
episodes.description:
How does a family dynasty climb from the mud to the absolute pinnacle of global wealth, only to collapse into a spectacular inferno of corporate suicide and criminal scandal? This is the story of the Bronfman family. From a bootlegging empire built in the shadows of Prohibition to the iconic Seagram corporation that dominated the world. Witness the story of a patriarch's genius, a son's disastrous Hollywood gamble that lost billions, and the granddaughters who became entangled in the terrifying NXIVM sex cult. This is a story you have to see to believe.
